name: Christmas defense
description:
Christmas Defense Defend Santa's house from the evil penguins who want to sabotage christmas!

- Play on 3 different maps.
- Each wave will come stronger enemies, try to hold out as long as possible!

  • How to play:
    • Drag the turrets in your inventory onto the gray construction platforms.
    • Select the turrets to see their stats or destroy them.
    • Earn money by killing enemies.
    • Stop them from reaching Santa's house!
    • When you lose you can use the remaining money to upgrade the turrets! (After losing, swipe left)

If you have problems while playing, turn on hardware acceleration and use Chrome / Firefox / Safari or Edge!

Comment what you think about the game! Any bug or feedback are always welcome!
